name: Combat Sky Fighter
description:
Brace yourself for the real challenging and breathtaking modern air assaults. In the sky highs with deadly jet air strikes against the enemy jet fighters. Survive in extreme air combat while flying your modern jet fighter simulator and use the mid-air acrobatic skills to bypass the rivals fighters like a real airborne pilot

Features:
• Real 3D game view and high quality graphics.
• Easy and smooth controls & realistic navigation.
• Realistic aerodynamics plane physics and simulation.
• Multiple thrilling jet flying missions.
